title: Eco-Friendly Modern Duplex with Private Garden in Central Zakopane
description: Welcome to an eco-conscious modern duplex conveniently situated in Zakopane’s Centrum district. This spacious duplex spans 155 square meters and features four bedrooms, three elegant bathrooms, and expansive living areas highlighted by floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows. Designed with comfort in mind, the home boasts wheelchair accessibility and advanced energy-efficient windows throughout. Enjoy direct access from the living space onto a serene, private garden—ideal for naturing a relaxed lifestyle in harmony with the landscape.
neighborhood_description: Centrum offers a calm yet engaging community-focused atmosphere, perfect for those seeking both convenience and tranquility. The knot of local amenities includes shops, cafés, parks, and easy access to hiking trails set against Zakopane’s scenic backdrop. Residents benefit from comprehensive public transport links and main highway access, ensuring stress-free trips into town or for further excursions.
lifestyle_benefits: minimal noise and traffic for tranquil living
optimized spaces for comfort and mobility
beautiful outdoor garden for activities or peaceful reflection
relaxed pace blended with nearby amenities
target_buyer: Perfect for retirees prioritizing comfort, accessibility, and an active-yet-serene lifestyle close to health services and community amenities.
market_positioning: Carefully curated for discerning buyers valuing sustainability, accessibility, and their own relaxing haven, this duplex sits in the mid- to upper-range segment—offering rare accessibility and eco credentials just minutes from Zakopane’s renowned natural beauty.
